Summary: Vally Springs event in early 80's by camp site with family.
divs: Sighting DetailsI remember there was a white light that turned into three lights but it looked like it was on the same ship or craft or whatever you want to call it.Then the three white lights turned in to different colored lights swirling and changing color scanning the ground. I remember my Dad saying it looked like a chopper. But then when the lights changed color he didn't know what it was. It also had no sound to it. All of the family were getting excited about it because it was so close to us. But I can't remember anything else from that night except my uncle would not sleep by himself. Later on my family said something about what looked like a bolt of lighting going down the valley but I don't remember that. As I was too young.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Strawberry
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
